mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time and Family Correspondence to Dr. Stigleman and William from Thomas G. Shelor
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, family, June 5, 1861, to Dr. Stigleman and William from his Father-in-Law, Thomas G. Shelor at Snowville, Va. Subject: report of June 4th and subsequent note concerning Union troops in Virginia. See related correspondence in File Folder 35. 1 original piece, 3 written pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
